timeline.message:
Add endpoint for `/eth/v1/beacon/states/:state_id/validators/:validator_id`

 - pre-requisite for validator client being able to use the updated duties api's

 - ensures the validator client can lookup the id of a validator by its pubkey.

 partially addresses #2809

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: nit: NumberFormatException seems a bit wrong for this error case?
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: it's just the fallthrough - it looks for a bunch of pre-defined strings then tries a number if it's none of those. this was just a specific case where i typed 'hea' instead of 'head' and it failed and threw 500
replies.author: rolfyone

timeline.bodyText: Just curious: I saw the same pattern in the other PR as well. Why do we have a ValidatorResponse class that gets wrapped up in a GetStateValidatorResponse class without adding any other variables or methods?
